nodes.text: Star Wars Manga: Silver is a limited edition of the manga One-Shots published by Tokyopop. It is the second issue following Star Wars Manga: Black. Although Leland Chee himself has stated that their canon status is fuzzy, the stories in this issue are all labeled as Infinites in the most recent French collection.
In addition to the stories, this issue contains two colored fold-out illustrations of Darth Vader by Yuji Kaida and Kia Asamiya.
